section.p: You sense a disharmony in the vibrations of the citadel. Your magical intuition gives you an idea - it ought to be possible to set up a musical vibration of your own, and the resonant harmonics might just shatter the thrumming ruby and bring it down on the necromancer.

p.if: If you have a flute or whistle, whether or not they have a bonus, .

section.p:
Otherwise, you will have to try to sing the right note.
